pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modeling Moderated Networks // Methods for modeling moderator variables in cross-sectional, temporal, and multi-level networks. Includes model selection techniques and a variety of plotting functions. Implements the methods described by Swanson (2020) https://www.proquest.com/openview/d151ab6b93ad47e3f0d5e5 9d7b6fd3d3.
